44 enum CTN_RefuseReason
45 {
47  CTN_TooManyAssociations,
49  CTN_CannotFork,
51  CTN_BadAppContext,
53  CTN_BadAEPeer,
55  CTN_BadAEService,
57  CTN_NoReason
58 };
